---
title: "Amsterdam Open Water Swim Meet Report"
---

This is a report on the feasibility of hosting a 5km open water swimming event through the canals of Amsterdam, based on the theoretical concerns raised by the municipality of Amsterdam.

**Key facts**

* What: The swim has to have a length of 5km.
* Where: Has to be proposed anywhere in the canals of Amsterdam according to infromation gathered.
* When: May 2024

**Contents of report**

1. [Feasibility of event based on water quality](water.ipynb)
1. [Energy requirements for event](energy.ipynb)
1. [Accommodation tendencies from tourism](airbnb_listings_JJ.ipynb)
1. [Event ammenities](transport.ipynb)
